body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our support team. My name is Gerald Scott and I'm a customer support representative at XYZ Car Dealership. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Natalie! To assist you better, may I ask for your phone number spelled out digit by digit and your email address spelled out letter by letter?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. My phone number is six four six, two two one, eight five zero zero. And my email is n a t a l i e, dot, h i l l, at, g m a i l, dot, c o m.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Natalie. That's very helpful information. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today regarding our Car Dealership and security?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm concerned about the security measures at your dealership. I feel like there have been some security lapses recently.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Natalie. We take security very seriously and will address your feedback promptly. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your prompt response. Security is important to me, especially when dealing with valuable assets like cars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We completely understand, Natalie. Your feedback will help us improve our security measures further. Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing your valuable feedback with us today, Natalie. If you have any more concerns or questions in the future, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Gerald. I appreciate your assistance. Goodbye!
